list4.title: About the PARK.ONE platform system upgrade maintenance announcement
list4.desText: About the PARK.ONE platform system upgrade maintenance announcement
contentText: The latest version of PARKONE, the world's first anti-breaking digital asset trading platform, will be officially available to all users on July 19, 2018. In order to bring a better user experience to all users and enjoy the smoothest transaction service, system upgrade and data migration will be carried out on July 18, 2018 from 21:00 to 24:00.

Since this upgrade involves background changes, for users who have already registered in the previous period, if the password is incorrect during login, please click the forgot password and re-set it. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

list3.title: Suggestions for rewards
contentText: The initial launch of the platform and the influx of large numbers of users resulted in congestion in the transaction. The platform is continuously improving. We hope that everyone will have a good trading experience on the PARK.ONE platform. We will also launch user improvement product plans. Users who propose product improvements will receive 6,666 PARK tokens, and then receive 8888 PARK token rewards after adoption. We hope that the platform can grow with everyone with the help of everyone, and let the PARK.ONE platform run all the way on the road to becoming a first-class trading platform.

list2.title: PARK.ONE Lists PARK/ETH Trading Pair
contentText: PARK.ONE will list PARK/ETH trading pair on 3pm June 25th, 2018(GMT+8). PARK is the cryptocurrency of the PARK.ONE platform and the total amount is 10 billion.

list1.title: PARK.ONE is now in beta
contentText: The open beta phase will end at 11:59 on June 24th. During this period, any problems and bugs in the registration, login, and transaction operations，please contact the official customer service ( WeChat: PARKONE-1)  for feedback. And we will greatly appreciate your valuable opinions and suggestions. PARK.ONE will timely optimize processing to bring you a better user experience.
